title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 4.
Overall Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, of value 3580.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars about 3354.0 was reached at Year 2016
